page.title: 13A Typical School Day
page.content: I get up on a Monday morning at 6.15 a.m.and get dressed.I go down stairs and light the fire.After I have lit the fire,I make the drinks and have some brekfast.I wash the pots and plates and get my school things ready.I get my coat on and get my bag to set off for school.When I get to school I go to the boiler out-let to keep warm.When I am warm enough I go and do the hymn number and give out registers.After I have done the jobs I go out for a bit until the bell goes.When the bell goes I hang my coat up and go to my class.The teacher does the register and then we go into assembly for prayers and a story.After that we have maths until 10.40 a.m. .At 10.40 we have break when I play games.Then when we go in at 10.55 a.m.we have English.
